last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 52
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Mall Rats mobilize, determined to save as many people from the new virus as possible. Ebony resorts to desperate measures, Lottie's thieving lands her in trouble, and the tribe acquire a boat to flee the City.

name: The Tribe
overview:
The Tribe is a New Zealand/British post-apocalyptic fictional TV series primarily aimed at teenagers. It is set in a near-future in which all adults have been wiped out by a deadly virus, leaving the children of the world to fend for themselves. The show's focus is on an unnamed city inhabited by tribes of children and teenagers. It was primarily filmed in and around Wellington, New Zealand.

The series was created by Raymond Thompson and Harry Duffin and was developed and produced by the Cloud 9 Screen Entertainment Group in conjunction with the UK's Channel 5. It has aired on over 40 broadcast networks around the world.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When Amber and Dal find Cloe wandering the streets, they have her take them to her companions Salene, Patsy, Paul and their dog Bob.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A mysterious figure watches the group at the mall as Amber informs Dal that they can't abandon the others.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Bray explains that he has been spying on the tribe to make sure the mall is a safe place to bring Trudy to have her baby -- but should she be allowed to stay?

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Bray and Trudy have been voted out of the tribe, but it seems that Trudy's contractions have started, prompting Lex to suspect a con.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Bray still hasn't returned, and Trudy continues to be ill, preventing her from feeding the newborn baby and prompting Dal to make the dangerous trek to his father's surgery at the abandoned hospital for antibiotics.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Trudy's illness has worsened, and Bray's persistent disappearances are increasingly aggravating the rest of the group.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Salene is fed up with the lack of respect for the chore assignments around the mall.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Upon learning that he's the father of Trudy's baby, Zoot is strongly encouraged by Bray to give up his leadership of the Locos.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Unexpected "guests" have been found in the mall, prompting a new method for assigning chores -- now, if only the various tribe members can adhere to their assignments.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The tribe holds an election to determine their leader, choosing between Amber and Lex.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: It's up to Lex to get Jack off the hook for hiding food from the rest of the tribe -- otherwise, Lex's own secret supply of water may be revealed as well.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Frightened by ghastly sounds coming from beneath the mall, the guys accompany Lex into the sewers to investigate -- that is, all but Bray, who seems to know what the others are after.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Despite having won the election, Lex appears to be losing his war against Amber as the boys begin to help the girls with their assignments, and he takes it out on Bluebell.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: With Cloe missing from the night before, Lex organizes a search party, but unfortunately they're headed in the wrong direction.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: While in danger of being caught by the Locos in the forest, Cloe is rescued by a mysterious girl named Tai-San.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Zandra is ready to take things to the next level with Lex, but when their date goes horribly awry, the other girls in the tribe feel Lex should be punished.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Bray's been captured by the Locos, and their new leader, Ebony, wants to know everything he has to tell about Zoot's whereabouts.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Much to Zandra's chagrin and Lex's relief, the wedding is interrupted when Ebony is discovered within the mall and imprisoned by the tribe members.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Following her encounter with Lex, Ebony escapes the mall, leaving the Mallrats to wonder if they're safe in staying.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: As the Mallrats prepare for the impending attack on the mall by the Locos, Bray sets Ebony straight with the truth about Zoot's mysterious disappearance and comes to an agreement with the Locos' new leader.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Trudy decides to take her depression into her own hands by downing a bunch of sleeping pills and is discovered by Salene, who chooses to do nothing about it.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Tensions are high within the Mallrats. Trudy has woken from her self-imposed slumber, becomes confrontational with Amber and gives Bray the silent treatment.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Fed up with the tribe, Trudy and Dal have left the mall, leaving only a note behind.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Tai-San continues to elude Lex's affections the morning after their trysts, much to Lex's confusion and frustration. Meanwhile, Ryan has romantic -- though odd -- dreams about Zandra.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Thinking it will land him more late-night encounters, Lex encourages Tai-San to teach him the ways of spiritual awakenings.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: The Nomads have decided against Dal's leaving the tribe and have taken him prisoner. Sasha's attempt to release him lands him in custody as well -- but what do the Nomads have in store for their prisoners?

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Dal and Sasha work out a plan of escape from the Nomads. Back with the Mall Rats, Zandra's anger and distrust of Tai-San goes on, prompting her to assign Lex a true test of his loyalty.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Most of the tribe head to the gathering at the beach. Meanwhile, Salene, Patsy and Trudy remain at the Mall and encounter troubles of their own.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: The tribal gathering goes horribly awry, with Lex meeting an old foe and the gang getting on the wrong side of Ebony. Meanwhile, at the Mall, Salene confesses all to Trudy.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Food continues to go missing from the supply, and though Trudy has forgiven Salene the wrongdoing, she encourages her to come clean to the rest of the group.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: A lot more food has gone missing, and people are starting to notice. Sasha is becoming more and more a favorite among the Mall Rats, including Amber. Bray, however, isn't nearly as keen on Sasha's presence.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: Sasha leads a group to trade with another tribe living at a nearby farm. But despite Bray's warning to leave the mall after the wedding ceremony, Sasha finds himself getting even closer with Amber.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: The mall is hopping with everyone working on the upcoming wedding of Zandra and Lex.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Lex and Zandra celebrate their honeymoon away from the others, while Amber and Sasha spend their own time away.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: With the place in complete disarray, Trudy is becoming increasingly frustrated with being the only person who works around the mall. Jack wants to become more mobile and enlists Dal and KC to help make it happen.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: Ryan and Salene become considerably closer as he helps her escape her newfound prison and she entrusts her secrets with him. Having decided to leave the tribe, Amber and Sasha return to the mall to find the gang in shambles.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: Sasha's departure has left Amber depressed and unable to let go, leading to further power struggles with Lex.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: Jack believes he's made a discovery that could potentially change the lives of everyone: an adult wandering the streets!

episodes.name: Episode 39
episodes.overview: Patsy has come face-to-face with the mysterious adult wandering about and convinces him to come back to the mall in hopes that he'll help restore order and hope to the group.

episodes.name: Episode 40
episodes.overview: What was once believed to be a blessing becomes the Mall Rats' worst nightmare when it's discovered that the mysterious old man seen wandering the streets is actually Glen, who now has the virus and has begun rapidly aging.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: Bray, Amber, Lex, Dal and KC split into two teams and leave the mall to find any clues to a cure for the virus afflicting Glen.

episodes.name: Episode 42
episodes.overview: Following Glen's death, the tribe are more determined than ever to find a cure for the Virus. Bray, Amber, Lex and Dal travel to Hope Island in search of information.

episodes.name: Episode 43
episodes.overview: Amber, Bray, Lex and Dal are trapped inside the lab at Hope Island with little time to escape before "full decontamination" of the facility is initiated.

episodes.name: Episode 44
episodes.overview: KC is gambling away the tribe members' personal items, including the pig! Can Cloe help win it all back?

episodes.name: Episode 45
episodes.overview: In his efforts to help Cloe escape the casino, KC has been captured. To continue the clearing of his conscience, Lex sets out to rescue KC, though the young gambler may not be welcomed back to the mall.

episodes.name: Episode 46
episodes.overview: Just as Bray feared, the Tribe Circus -- led by the insane Top Hat -- invades the mall attempting to enslave the Mall Rats, but the Mall Rats aren't giving up without a fight.

episodes.name: Episode 47
episodes.overview: The mall has been set ablaze by Top Hat and the Tribe Circus, and the Mall Rats are hopelessly trapped inside-- that is, until Lex secures a deal with Ebony and the Locos.

episodes.name: Episode 48
episodes.overview: Ebony seems to have won, having taken not only the antidote, but also Lex and Bray. But Amber's not giving Bray up so easily, and she embarks on a search for the Locos' hideout.

episodes.name: Episode 49
episodes.overview: Bray is still being held prisoner by Ebony, but the tribe hatch a plan to spy on her hotel. Meanwhile, Lex struggles to survive alone in the City and tempers flare at the Mall.

episodes.name: Episode 50
episodes.overview: Jack believes he's uncovered the secret to the mysterious formula, but he has a hard time convincing the others to go along with his hunch since it means potentially leaving the mall for good.

episodes.name: Episode 51
episodes.overview: Prompted by Jack's insistence and Tai-San's vision, which seems to confirm his hunch, the Mall Rats agree to leave their home for Eagle Mountain.

episodes.name: Episode 52
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats have encountered a literal roadblock on their way to Eagle Mountain, but they're saved by the sudden arrival of Bray and Ebony in one of the Locos' buses.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: While the Mall Rats try to carry on after suffering two devastating losses, a strange cult dedicated to Zoot arrives on the shores near the City.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats arrive back home, despondent and still reeling from their loss. Lex, Tai-San and Ebony bring the antidote to the Mall, while Bray brings Danni.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats find themselves harassed by kids desperate for the antidote. Following her destruction of the formula, Tai-San searches for herbs to create her own version of it while the Chosen continue their journey to the City.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Just as the gang are preparing to flee the Mall, Tai-San claims that she has made the antidote. Trudy feels increasingly alone, while an enraged Alice and others arrive at the Mall demanding the real antidote.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Alice takes Tai-San hostage until she is sure that Ellie is on the mend, and when she is, the two sisters decide to move to the Mall, with Alice becoming Tai-San's bodyguard. Meanwhile, the Chosen arrive in the City.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Alice appoints Dal as Chief of the farm in her absence, while Bray and Danni begin arranging a meeting of tribe leaders. The Chosen arrive in the City and move in on the Mall Rats.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Bray, Danni and Ebony attend the meeting of tribe leaders, which goes well until the Chosen arrive and frighten away the other leaders. Meanwhile, Alice becomes concerned about Tai-San, who begins exhibiting symptoms of the Virus.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Alice is increasingly worried by Tai-San's continued illness, while Jack and Ellie search for answers about the Virus much to Danni's annoyance. Trudy appoints Patsy as Brady's official child minder, with disastrous results.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Trudy is distraught following Brady's kidnapping, with Patsy fleeing to escape her wrath. Tai-San is in a critical condition after an explosion in the laboratory and Alice is determined to find proof that KC was behind it.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Tai-San has woken from her coma, but is suffering from amnesia. Still distraught, Trudy is outraged by the warm welcome Patsy receives when she returns to the Mall, and the video Jack and Ellie discovered proves to be highly significant.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Bray finds it difficult to deal with Tai-San's decision to tell him the formula, Jack and Ellie investigate the theory that the Virus came space, while Danni creates a Bill of Rights just as the Chosen invade Alice's farm.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: After being confronted by the Chosen at the farm, Dal arrives to tell the tribe about them and they deduce that the Chosen stole Brady. Salene's frustration at Ryan's aloofness sends her off the rails, while Jack makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: In order to get the Guardian on her side, Ebony tricks Trudy into following her to the Chosen's lair. Jack and Ellie try to find the missing videotape and theorize about the Virus, while Salene and Ryan continue to butt heads.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: With Ebony's fate in Trudy's hands, the pair reminisce about their lives with Bray and Martin before the Virus.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: The tribe discovers Trudy is missing and Tai-San suggests the Chosen as culprits. Jack and Ellie have trouble expressing their feelings for each other. Meanwhile, at the Chosen's lair, Trudy and Ebony hatch an escape plan.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Ebony makes Bray a proposition, while Trudy is forced to join the Chosen. Will she ever see her friends again?

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Reeling from his loss, Bray lashes out at Lex, who he blames for Trudy's disappearance. KC, Patsy and Cloe go trading, Ellie tries to smooth things over with Jack, while Ebony resorts to blackmail to get what she wants.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Ebony is irritating everyone with her newfound authority, while Lex finds himself unneeded and unwanted. Jack and Ellie continue to blow hot and cold for each other and Ryan tells Salene about his life with Lex before the Virus.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: The tribe is occupied with the tribal leader gathering which they are arranging at the Mall, and Danni is confident about her Bill of Rights. Jack is jealous of Dal and Ellie's newfound closeness, while Ebony hatches a deadly scheme.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: A deflated tribe buries Bob, with Tai-San convinced someone tried to poison her and the finger pointed at an unlikely person. Jack and Ellie begin work on the news sheet, while Salene tries to help Lex.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Lex's actions have severe consequences for him, while Ebony's questions at Danni's trial lead to a startling revelation.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Danni's trial reaches its conclusion, prompting more questions than answers. Jack's jealousy about Ellie and Dal continues, Bray tries to make amends with Tai-San and Ebony's scheming intensifies.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: The tribe host a trading market. Danni worries that Jack and Ellie will find information related to her father's work, while Patsy and Cloe get a new dog, and Lex meets his match.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Danni's secret is out, with Bray's authority called into question. Spotting an advantage, Ebony plots to take over the tribe, while Lex finds himself double crossed.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Ellie is frustrated by the tribe's refusal to print the truth about the Virus in the news sheet, while Danni is enjoying her new job as Judge, and Spike is back, looking for revenge.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Dal is frustrated with his work party, who believe that the Virus is gone. Ebony is Spike's prisoner, Jack and Ellie are in romantic bliss, while Ryan proves to be a successful teacher.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Tai-San has a dream about Ebony being imprisoned, but finds it difficult to convince the others that she is in danger. Ebony herself continues to have flashbacks about Zoot, and Patsy and Cloe decide to find boyfriends.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: The tribe find that they are no longer trusted, with the other tribes turning against them. Ebony is an emotional wreck after her ordeal with Spike, and Dal finds himself the object of Patsy and Cloe's affections.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats are pleased to be trading and working with the other tribes again, Patsy and Cloe continue their pursuit of Dal, while Tai-San tries to help Ebony recover.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Ellie is determined to print everything the tribe knows about the Virus in the news sheet, Salene is frustrated by Ryan and his pressuring her to start a family, and Lex's incompetence costs the tribe dearly.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats host a dance party for all the tribes. Salene is still angry with Ryan, Alice tries to impress Lex, and Ebony is determined to bring the token thief to justice.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats encounter revolt from other tribes, who are tired of working and threaten strike. Ebony opens her heart to Bray, but he only has eyes for Danni. Ryan stupidly makes Lex fall off the wagon, and there is an unexpected return.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: The tribe is astounded by the return of Trudy, who remains cagey about the details of her escape. Most wonder whether the Chosen will come for her, whereas Ebony sees it as an opportunity to exert power.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Alice lies trapped in the farmhouse, Ebony continues to throw her weight around, and Ryan tries in vain to make up with Salene.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Bray and Danni prepare for the tribal forum, Alice encourages Lex to improve himself and Trudy forgives Patsy her mistake, but arouses Salene's suspicions in the process.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: Salene feels guilty about not apologizing to Ryan before he went story hunting with Ellie. Meanwhile, Alice falls further for Lex, Trudy's behavior becomes more erratic, and Ebony decides to move out of the Mall.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: Bray is confident the Mall Rats can bring peace to the City, but only if they allow Billy-Boy, the leader of the Jackals, to trade at market. Alice makes a move on Lex, Ryan decides to move on, and Jack is given a special assignment.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: Salene finds Ryan just in time, and Jack's spying gets off to a bad start when he is almost caught by Ebony. Cloe's suspicions about Trudy grow, while Tai-San's interference in Lex and Alice's relationship only complicates things further.

episodes.name: Episode 39
episodes.overview: Trudy reveals a twisted side by sending Cloe a demented gift, Tai-San is conflicted in her feelings for Lex, with both trying to let Alice down gently, while Ellie finally hears news of the Chosen.

episodes.name: Episode 40
episodes.overview: The tribe is overjoyed by the news that the Chosen have been defeated. KC gets his rat race after all, but he may not have the sure fire winner, while Jack has enlisted Dal to help him spy on Ebony at the hotel.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: Lex is ill the morning after his meal at Trudy's, arousing Tai-San's suspicions. Ryan proposes to Salene and Ebony hosts a pool party. Meanwhile, Wolf passes Trudy's message on to the Guardian, who plans terror for the City.

episodes.name: Episode 42
episodes.overview: The Chosen continue to kidnap people all over the City, with a little boy alerting Ellie to the threat. Tai-San ends her secret romance with Lex, Trudy loses her temper with Cloe, and a troubled Salene seeks comfort away from Ryan.

episodes.name: Episode 43
episodes.overview: Salene is left heartbroken and despondent, Lex breaks the news about his secret relationship to Alice, but neglects to tell her that the object of his affection is Tai-San, and more about Trudy's motives is revealed.

episodes.name: Episode 44
episodes.overview: The Chosen prepare for their final assault on the City by targeting Ebony, Dal opens his heart to Ellie, Bray goes in search of Salene, and Alice incorrectly guesses the identity of Lex's mystery lover.

episodes.name: Episode 45
episodes.overview: Ebony vows to clear her name, the Jackals disrupt trading at market, Alice gets herself into trouble, and Salene finds help from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: Episode 46
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats are worried when the market is abandoned by the other tribes, Alice continues spying for Ebony, Salene brings May back to the Mall with her, and Lex finds himself accused of murder.

episodes.name: Episode 47
episodes.overview: Trudy successfully manages to deflect suspicion away from herself, Ebony continues the search for the traitor in her outfit, and Lex has a question for Tai-San.

episodes.name: Episode 48
episodes.overview: It is the day of Ryan and Salene and Lex and Tai-San's double wedding, and the Chosen have plans for Ebony and the rest of the Mall Rats.

episodes.name: Episode 49
episodes.overview: With Ebony missing and presumed dead, Patsy is racked with guilt. Salene has regrets about her wedding, and Alice finds herself a prisoner of the Chosen.

episodes.name: Episode 50
episodes.overview: Ebony demands that Patsy tell her everything she knows, Cloe discovers another of Trudy's secrets, while Bray, Danni, Lex and Ryan find themselves in mortal danger.

episodes.name: Episode 51
episodes.overview: Danni and the other tribe leaders are prisoners of the Chosen, and the Mall is invaded.

episodes.name: Episode 52
episodes.overview: With the rest of the tribe imprisoned in the hotel, Bray, Lex, Ryan and Jack plan to break them out and save the City from destruction.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats are in chains, with Bray and Lex initially presumed dead. However, Ebony soon finds and leads them to safety, but the others, starved and increasingly desperate, are not quite as lucky.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: With Bray captured, Ebony and Lex are unsure what their next step should be, and finally meet the enigmatic figure who has been stalking them. Trudy tries to convince Bray to join the Chosen, while the rest of the tribe struggle on.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Ellie is guilt stricken about what happened to Jack, Ebony is strangely unwilling to talk about the female leader of Pride's tribe, and the Guardian tries to break Bray's will.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ebony and Lex are back in the City, the Guardian gives Trudy an impossible task, and Pride has a startling revelation for his new friends.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Salene and May join the Chosen as spies for the Mall Rats, Trudy is further tested by the Guardian, while Bray, Lex, Ebony and Dal meet a familiar face from the past.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: At the Mall, Luke shows Ellie an unexpected kindness while elsewhere, Amber remains aloof, refusing to speak to Bray about how she survived the fire at Eagle Mountain.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Amber confesses the truth about what happened at Eagle Mountain to a bewildered Bray, Luke and the Guardian plot their next move against the Mall Rats, and Lex picks a fight with the wrong person.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Bray clears his name, but Amber is still unwilling to revisit the past. Meanwhile, Lex and Ebony head back to the City, and the mind games continue at the Mall.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Bray, Amber, Dal and Pride plan their attack against the Chosen, Salene, May and Patsy begin their education under the watchful eye of the Guardian, while Ebony and Lex hatch a deadly scheme.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: With the attack bungled, Bray and the others retreat, while Trudy finds herself under suspicion of helping arrange it. Alice and Ellie recruit another member of the tribe to spy for the Mall Rats, and May's fear leads her to foolishness.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Patsy and Cloe continue spying for the Mall Rats, and May secretly works for the Guardian, leading Bray, Lex, Ebony, Dal and Amber into a trap which has deadly consequences.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A distraught Amber and the others bury Dal, May continues her work for the Guardian, and Ebony tries to use Pride to break up Bray and Amber for good.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Cloe has been caught spying and sent to work in the mines, leaving Patsy worried about what could happen to her. Tai-San finds herself the object of the Guardian's attentions, and Alice and Ellie play with fire.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Salene and Ryan grow further apart, May's meddling makes Trudy become suspicious of Tai-San, while Ellie's rule breaking almost lands her in deep trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Trudy's attempt to seduce the Guardian fails, compromising her position as Supreme Mother. Lex is determined to visit the Mall and see Tai-San again, while KC decides to leave the tribe and take his chances outside.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Trudy has been sentenced to death, and Bray's suggestion to help her is rejected by Lex and Ebony. To save Trudy, the Mall Rats make an uneasy pact with Lt Luke, while Ryan gives Salene an ultimatum.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Trudy is with Bray and the others, much to the displeasure of Lex and Ebony, who want to use her to send a message to the Chosen, but Bray has other ideas. Back at the Mall, KC lands himself in hot water.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: The Guardian decides to have Trudy's name blackened across the City, May's negligence leads to trouble, Alice convinces Ellie to try and charm Luke, and Pride's kindness could be his undoing.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Pride is a prisoner, the Guardian is afraid of losing his grip on power, KC gets on the wrong side of Lt Luke, and the Mall Rats are further depleted by Patsy's being sent to the mines.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Tai-San worms her way further into the Guardian's world, while Salene is conflicted about her membership of the Chosen. May becomes a spy in Patsy's place, Ellie and Lt Luke grow closer, and Ryan's anger boils over.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Salene is devastated after Ryan is taken away, while Ned's attempt to sell Pride to the Chosen backfires. Tai-San continues to tempt the Guardian, and Bray, Lex and Ebony's search for the fuel dump goes horribly wrong.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Bray, Lex and Ebony celebrate their victory against the Chosen, while Salene's loneliness sees her turn to an unlikely source. Ned irritates Alice, KC's scamming catches up with him, and Tai-San is taken aback by the Guardian's proposal.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Bray, Lex and Ebony stumble upon a group of pregnant girls who lead them to a propaganda puppet show put on by the Chosen, which they infiltrate. Tai-San is conflicted about the Guardian's offer, and Tally proves a handful for KC.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Bray, Lex and Ebony hear word of the coronation of the new Supreme Mother, and see it as the perfect opportunity to strike, while Salene feels increasingly isolated, and Ellie opens her heart to Lt Luke.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Lex is enraged at Tai-San's behavior, while back at the Mall, Tai-San herself begins to question her decision. Alice is full of guilt about Salene's accident and Ellie avoids Lt Luke.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Tai-San tries to convince Lex of her love, while Salene is distraught by the loss of her baby. May and Pride grow closer, and Bray decides against assassinating the Guardian, but someone else has other ideas.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Tai-San has a disturbing nightmare about the coronation ceremony, and Bray is exasperated by Lex's actions, which may make her nightmare a reality. Bray goes to stop him, but Ebony has other ideas.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Lex is in shock about what he has done, while at the Mall, unbeknownst to him, Tai-San is well and recovering. Lt Luke gets on the wrong side of the Guardian and Pride hatches a plan with May.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Lt Luke and Salene find themselves on trial for allegedly helping the rebels kidnap Brady. Meanwhile, Brady is back with Trudy, who Lex and Ebony do not make feel welcome, and Amber has news for Bray.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: With the Praetorian Guards in control of the City, the Guardian is increasingly unhinged. Alice tries to rally what is left of the Mall Rats, while Trudy helps the rebels, and Amber gives Bray the silent treatment.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: The City is in turmoil, with gang fighting widespread. Tai-San is concerned about the Guardian, who has begin to hallucinate about Zoot. Alice and Ned try to find an escape route out of the Mall, while Pride is in demand.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: Bray is determined to attack the Mall now that the Chosen are demoralized. At the Mall, Salene opens her heart to Lt Luke, Alice and Ned find a way out, and the others are horrified to learn what the Guardian has planned for them.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: With the bomb disarmed, everyone celebrates, and the Guardian is imprisoned. Alice and Ned become closer, Ellie tries to convince Lt Luke to run, and Trudy has to rescue Salene before she makes a fatal mistake.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: The Mall is surrounded by the other tribes baying for blood, with only Bray and Amber to calm them down. Lex has it in for May, Alice is embarrassed about her night with Ned, Trudy helps Salene, and Lt Luke makes a decision.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Lt Luke's trial is to be held, and Bray asks Amber to be Magistrate for the City. Lex's behavior gets him in trouble, Salene is still feeling lost, Alice avoids Ned, and Jack arrives back at the Mall.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: Moz continues to cause problems for the Mall Rats, who decide to hold a re-initiation ceremony for all members. Jack is saddened to hear about the deaths of his friends, and cannot abide Trudy's presence, while Ebony has plans for Luke.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: Amber and Trudy have been kidnapped and are being held hostage. Meanwhile, Jack finds Ellie distant, and Tai-San's treatment of the Guardian continues to wreck her relationship with Lex.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: Bray, Lex and Pride raid Moz's place, but find nothing, and she denies any knowledge of Amber and Trudy's kidnapping. Ellie's guilt grows, and May tries to help Salene. Jack misses Dal, while Lex and Tai-San are at an impasse.

episodes.name: Episode 39
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats receive a second note, with instructions about handing over the Guardian. Bray is conflicted, and Tai-San is against it, but the others are all for it. Meanwhile, May considers moving on, and Jack tries to romance Ellie.

episodes.name: Episode 40
episodes.overview: Bray decides against handing over the Guardian, opting to disguise himself as him at the drop off. KC, Tally and Andy hatch a plot to steal the Guardian's ring, Jack is heartbroken over Ellie, and Ebony makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: Ebony pulls a double cross on Ned, Lt Luke and Ellie make their relationship public, Andy tries to convince KC and Tally that the Guardian is faking his condition, and the situation with Amber and Trudy pushes Pride and Bray over the edge.

episodes.name: Episode 42
episodes.overview: Bray drowns his sorrows away from the Mall, Pride has a theory about the kidnapping, Ned's behavior arouses Alice's suspicions, and the Guardian frightens Andy again.

episodes.name: Episode 43
episodes.overview: Pony Joe and his gang find an unconscious Bray, while Lex and Pride go out looking for him. Meanwhile, Ebony grills Moz, Alice is saddened by what she finds at the farm, and Lt Luke and Ellie face more problems.

episodes.name: Episode 44
episodes.overview: Bray is still with Moon and her gang, and Lex is reveling in his new job as Sheriff. Ebony suggests Ellie start up The Amulet again and recruits Lt Luke to invent a currency system, while Salene tames the horse KC got from Pony Joe.

episodes.name: Episode 45
episodes.overview: Lex has trouble recruiting deputies and Ned is worried about being found out. Lt Luke is put in charge of the new currency, Andy refuses to go anywhere near the Guardian again, and May confesses her love for Pride.

episodes.name: Episode 46
episodes.overview: The tribe is gearing up for the elections, Lex is surprised at who his new recruits are, Pride suspects Ned of the kidnapping, Ellie puts herself in danger, and Ebony speaks to the Guardian.

episodes.name: Episode 47
episodes.overview: Ebony hands the Guardian a weapon, leading Ned into a trap. Bray is on the election trail, May tells Alice about her and Pride, and Amber and Trudy are increasingly desperate.

episodes.name: Episode 48
episodes.overview: Alice is distraught after Ned's body is discovered, the Guardian terrorizes Amber and Trudy, while polling day arrives for the City.

episodes.name: Episode 49
episodes.overview: Amber is plagued by nightmares about the Guardian, and Ebony is back at the hotel, throwing her weight around. Jack bumps into Cloe on the road, while the Guardian is spying on the Mall Rats.

episodes.name: Episode 50
episodes.overview: Bray is frustrated by the lack of laws in the City, while Tai-San is to meet the Guardian to trap him, but Ebony has other ideas. May feels neglected by Pride, Jack and Cloe arrive back at the Mall, and Alice vows to find Ned's killer.

episodes.name: Episode 51
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats prepare for their capture of the Guardian, Lt Luke is dismayed by the way Ebony is running things, Trudy and Cloe reconnect, and May is heartbroken.

episodes.name: Episode 52
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats decide to put Ebony on trial, Alice is out for revenge, while a mysterious airplane appears in the skies above the City.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The City is in chaos after the appearance of the airplane. No-one knows who these new arrivals are or what they want. Meanwhile, Amber is in labor and completely alone.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The remaining Mall Rats band together to find out what is going on, while Trudy helps Amber deliver her baby. Salene finds a little girl close to the Mall and takes her home, but someone is watching her.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The City's tribes hold a crisis meeting to decide what to do about the invading Technos. Meanwhile, Ellie goes to the farm to look for Alice, Dee makes a mistake, and Amber and Trudy have to get by without Bray.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ved is in trouble after losing his communicator, while Ram tracks its signal to the Mall. Jack has a breakthrough about the source of the Technos' power, and Amber makes a decision about her and baby Bray's future.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Lex is angry when his shrine to Tai-San is robbed, Jay is sent to deal with Ebony, while Ellie is devastated by Jack's capture, and Amber and Trudy are still on their trek to find the Ecos.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: While the Mall Rats plan their attack, Ebony secretly strikes a deal with Jay. Cloe feels babied by Salene, and Java and Siva make a discovery.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: As per Jay's instructions, Ebony has to convince the other tribes to co-operate with the Technos, while Java and Siva secretly plot to eliminate her. Ellie is despondent about Jack and Alice, and Pride finds Cloe's love note.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Ebony walks into Java and Siva's trap, Pride has difficulty finding food for the tribe, and Ellie's depression makes her consider suicide.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The food situation is increasingly dire, with Lex predicting an end to supplies reaching the City. Java and Siva reveal their history with Ebony, Ved gets in trouble again, and Ellie helps the kids come out of their shell.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The failed bomb attempt leads Ebony to investigate, and it seems Pride may have something to hide. Cloe and Dee get their own back on Ved, while Salene finally convinces the kids to reveal their names.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: The investigation into the attempted bombing continues, while Pride secretly meets with other tribe leaders, and becomes increasingly cagey when questioned. Ved tries to smooth things over with Cloe, and food is frighteningly scarce.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Although Pride is under arrest for attempted murder, Ebony is not convinced and he denies any involvement. Elsewhere, fighting over food is becoming more common, and the real identity of the bomber comes as a shock.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Ellie is under arrest, with her fate left in Jay's hands. Meanwhile, Lex tries his luck with Siva, and Mouse and Charlie disappear, prompting Pride and Cloe to search for them.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: The food situation is critical, with riots breaking out. Pride tries to let Salene down gently, while Siva sneaks off to see Lex, Ved tries to impress Cloe, and Charlie is missing.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: The Technos' food delivery is met with mixed response, Mouse misses Charlie, Lex's toothache worsens, and Pride and Salene take a trip to the countryside.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Ebony and Jay have to convince the farmers to bring food to the City again, Dee decides to stop Lex's toothache once and for all, and Pride gets into trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Lex is seriously ill, with antibiotics unavailable and Ebony's request for them denied by Ram. Pride and Salene are worried by the idea of the Technos bringing electricity back to the City, and Java's jealousy intensifies.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Ebony gives Lex the antibiotics stolen from the medicine chest by Siva, who is unaware that Ram knows what she did. Pride plans to sabotage the Technos' reconnection of the power supply, and Ved takes Cloe out on a date.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: As the City celebrates the reconnection of the power supply, Pride and Jay regain consciousness, agreeing to call it quits on their rivalry. Ram gets revenge on Siva, while Mouse and Sammy's playing results in calamity.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Trudy reveals what happened to her and Amber, with her location narrowed down to a guarded building in the City. Ram plays mind games, and Salene and Pride play a prank on Mouse and Sammy.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats are unsure what to do with Amber and the rest of the test subjects, while Ram orders his men to retrieve them. Jay and Ram have a disagreement, Java warns Lex off Siva, and Siva plays with fire.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats are worried that Ebony will tell Ram about Amber and the other test subjects, while Siva fears Java will tell him about her and Lex. Meanwhile Ram pushes Ebony for an answer, and Ved and Cloe take things to the next level.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Ebony is pressured by Ram for an answer, while Jay feels threatened by him because of his own secret relationship with her. Salene is jealous over Amber and Pride's closeness, and Lex seems doomed to a dark fate.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Lex receives his punishment, Ebony reluctantly seeks Java's help in cooling Ram's affections, Ved shows Jay the program Ram has been working on, and Dee stirs things.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: The City is excited about the arrival of television again in the form of CityNet, the Technos' latest advancement, but the Mall Rats are dubious. Dee tries to secure Lex's release, Pride is frustrated, and Cloe fears she may be pregnant.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Ram broadcasts Lex's fight across the City via CityNet, with an extra, deadly twist. Pride finally levels with Salene about his feelings for her, while Cloe is heartbroken over Ved.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Following his victory, Lex has a newfound popularity in the City. Amber asks Cloe to use Ved to gain information on the Technos' experiments, and Mouse and Sammy come up with a get rich quick scheme.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Sammy comes up trumps with footage of the Technos' secret experiments, and Pride's friend Patch helps the Mall Rats hijack the CityNet broadcast.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Ram sends Java to the Mall to find out where Amber is, Pride spreads word about the Technos' experimentation across the City, and Ebony's desperation makes her do something stupid.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats and Jay argue about how they can derail Ram's smear campaign against them, Java double crosses Ebony, and Lex's next fight pairs him with an unlikely opponent.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: Riots break out as a result of Ram switching off the City's power supply, Ebony quits as City leader, Lex is a laughing stock due to his losing the fight, and Ram plays mind games with Ebony.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: The City has running water again, and Ram rigs the City Leader election in Salene's favor, believing her to be easy to manipulate. Ebony is heartbroken over Jay, leading her to make an important decision.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: The Technos prepare their cyber cafs for use by the City's inhabitants. Ram announces his and Ebony's nuptials, with Salene roped into officiating the ceremony, while Pride's disdain for the Technos gets him into trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Lex takes Siva to hide out at Alice and Ellie's farm, and asks for Ebony's help in calling off Ram's search. Meanwhile, Pride has been brainwashed into believing in CityNet and reality space, much to Salene's horror.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Lex brings Siva to live at the Mall, Ebony receives a very tempting offer, May reappears in reality space, and Jay's hopes of a brave new world are dashed.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats continue their work at the hospital. Mouse and Sammy get scanned, while Cloe is missing, and Siva finds it difficult to adjust to life away from the Technos.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: Ram and Ved face off in a reality space battle for Cloe, Mouse's playing goes badly awry, May suffers the after effects of the game, and Pride may be unable to resist it.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: Ram goes ahead with his plan to charge people to play the game, while Salene is concerned by Pride's apparent addiction to it. Mouse and Sammy join a work party to earn credits, and Jay makes an important decision.

episodes.name: Episode 39
episodes.overview: Ebony realizes she made a foolish mistake, while gang violence in the City worsens. Pride's addiction to the game deepens, and Mouse and Sammy continue to secretly toil for their game credits.

episodes.name: Episode 40
episodes.overview: The City is a war zone, and Salene's plan to move the medical center to the Mall means it is busier than ever. Ebony and Jay reconcile, Ram is very ill, and May appears to be as addicted to the game as Pride.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: Ram is still seriously ill, with Java taking advantage of the situation. Siva encourages Lex to tell Salene about Pride's addiction, and Mouse stumbles upon May and Pride inside the game.

episodes.name: Episode 42
episodes.overview: Ved enters reality space in a last ditch effort to save Ram, with Ebony stumbling upon their endeavor. Lex and Siva have domestic differences, and Pride and May admit their addiction to the rest of the tribe, while Mouse may need help too.

episodes.name: Episode 43
episodes.overview: Jay is a prisoner of the Technos, and Ram has a very fiendish fate in store for him. Salene demands to know who stole her earrings, while supplies have also been going missing from the hospital store.

episodes.name: Episode 44
episodes.overview: Jay is the most sought after person in the City, with the Mall under attack by an angry mob who believe he is being hidden there. He finds help from an unlikely source, but may not be as safe as he assumes.

episodes.name: Episode 45
episodes.overview: Aware of Ebony's treachery, Ram is inconsolable. Pride helps Ebony and Jay escape the City, while also trying to make things up with Salene.

episodes.name: Episode 46
episodes.overview: Ram widens the search for Ebony and Jay, and the Technos put the City under martial law. Salene and Pride continue to bicker, Siva offers to teach Mouse how to read, and Ebony and Jay stumble upon two familiar faces.

episodes.name: Episode 47
episodes.overview: Ebony and Jay are invited to camp with the Ecos for a while, but Amber's presence makes Ebony uneasy. Sammy sneaks out to play the game, May tries to get back with Pride, and Salene reaches a decision.

episodes.name: Episode 48
episodes.overview: The Technos roll out their latest technology in the City, and Lex spots an opportunity. Ebony is irritated by Amber and Jay's closeness, Sammy sneaks out again, and May is oblivious about Salene and Pride's relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 49
episodes.overview: Amber, Ebony and Jay head back to the City, while Ram prepares himself for the end. Sammy tries to convince Mouse of Paradise's merits, and Pride comes clean to May about his and Salene's relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 50
episodes.overview: Amber, Ebony and Jay reach the City, only to find it deserted. When they reach the Mall, Lex is angered by their reappearance. Salene makes her peace with May, Siva lays her cards on the table, and Patch writes a note to Dee.

episodes.name: Episode 51
episodes.overview: Ebony is jealous of Amber, Trudy is distraught about losing Brady, Salene catches May playing the game again, and an old face from the past returns.

episodes.name: Episode 52
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats prepare for their assault on the Technos, while Ebony is plagued by disturbing visions.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Ebony continues to be plagued by visions of Zoot, and he is also seen around the City by others. Mega has secret plans, Salene is in trouble, Sammy is hooked on Paradise, and a new face saves Ram.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The Locos' police car reappears in the City, and as Ebony's nightmares continue, Trudy has one as well. Lex tries to keep the peace, Mega and Java collaborate further, and Ram is delirious at Ruby's saloon.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The City is awash with rumors about Zoot's reappearance. Amber receives devastating news, Salene is still imprisoned, and Slade has a change of heart about Ram.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ebony feels neglected by Jay, and Lex continues to search in vain for Tai-San. Jack arrives back in the City and meets a new friend, but danger is not far away, while Ram grows increasingly desperate.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: As May searches the City for Pride, she experiences the Zoot rumors firsthand. Mega and Java play mind games, Salene's situation is increasingly perilous, and Jack tries to convince Gel to go to the Mall with him.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Ebony is convinced of Zoot's power, Amber and Jay get closer, Siva stumbles on Lex's stash, Slade tries to break Ram, and Mega and Java plot their next move.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The City is spiraling out of control, and Ebony is an unwitting pawn in Mega and Java's game. Lex saves Gel with a little help from Slade, leaving Siva convinced she has been abandoned. Meanwhile, May's lies lead to tragedy.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Ebony, Java and Siva set up headquarters at their old high school, with Ebony increasingly deluded. Salene arrives back at the Mall, but Pride is nowhere to be seen, while Trudy is conflicted in her feelings for Jay.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats bury Pride. Ebony and her sisters spread Zoot's message across the City, with Java happy and Siva increasingly concerned, Mega preys on May's guilt, and Ram opens up about his past.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Amber and Salene head for the Ecos' place. Mega manipulates May into agreeing to spy on the Mall Rats for him, while he and Java meet in secret. Sammy and Gel upset Trudy, and Slade gets in trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Amber and Salene arrive at the Ecos' place, where they hold a ceremony for Pride. Jack is horrified after his run in with "Zoot", prompting fear among the tribe, while Sammy and Mouse have a similar close encounter.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Amber and Salene head home, while Trudy and Jay agree to keep their relationship secret. Mouse and Sammy tell Jack of their encounter with "Zoot", leading to a discovery. Mega and Java plot their next move, and Slade encourages Ram to walk.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats meet with Ebony and her followers, Amber and Salene arrive back in the City, Lex goes on the hunt, May continues her spying, and Ram makes a breakthrough.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Lex reveals Ram's real identity to Ruby, Trudy worries about Amber's reaction to her and Jay's relationship, and Ellie, suffering from amnesia, reappears in the City, only to be taken prisoner by the Zootists.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Ebony continues to be manipulated by Java and Mega, with Siva unsure of the damage being done to her sister. Trudy worries about Jay's feelings for her, and Lex tries to convince Ruby to free him.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Lex narrowly avoids death, Amber finds out about Trudy and Jay, Java tries to manipulate Ellie, and Slade spies on Ebony.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: The Zootists prepare for the "return" of Zoot, with the tribe making a breakthrough as to how his reappearance will be engineered, while Java continues to use Ellie, sending her back to the Mall with a deadly package in tow.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: The explosion has left the Mall Rats shaken, and they decide to send Amber to try and talk some sense into the other tribes. Meanwhile, Siva makes a last ditch appeal to Ebony, and Mega becomes frustrated with Darryl.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Lex and Ram narrowly escape an angry mob, while back at the Mall, Amber is injured and the tribe is worried about the anarchy outside. Mega encourages Java to increase Ebony's dose of Paradise, and Slade finds Darryl.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Amber is seriously ill, with Jay's attentions towards her an annoyance to Trudy. Java threatens Siva with retribution if she continues to hinder her plans, and May almost comes clean to Salene, but her malice gets the better of her.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Jay is worried by Mega's deception, while Mega himself plans a mass bar coding of everyone in the City. Salene's dependence on alcohol becomes a cause for concern, while Slade let's Ram in on a secret.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Amber is angered by Mega's creation of work details, Ebony finds things unraveling around her, Sammy inadvertently ends up alone in Zootist territory, and Slade meets Siva in secret.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Amber experiences a work party firsthand, Lex is a prisoner of the Zootists, Siva tries to convince Ebony of Java's deceit, and Ellie suspects Gel may be the spy.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Lex and Siva find themselves imprisoned together, Amber confronts Mega about the ill treatment received by the work parties, and Ebony plays mind games with Java.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Amber meets Ebony as arranged, Lex and Siva head to Liberty, Jack and Ellie follow May to her secret rendezvous with Mega, and Salene's alcoholism escalates.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats try to convince May to lure Mega into a trap, Slade takes Ebony to meet a familiar face, Ruby snoops on Ram, and Mouse sneaks out of the Mall to head to the Eco tribe.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats try to decide what to do about Mega, while Mega himself blocks Jack's access to his secret files. Meanwhile, Ram continues his study of Slade's brain and Salene's paranoia almost leads to trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Ebony plays mind games with the now imprisoned Java, Jay is conflicted about the Mall Rats' plan for Mega, Salene and Mouse are asked to join the Ecos, Slade takes Darryl to Liberty, and May is voted out of the tribe.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Mega implements his strategies on the City, while Ebony plans her attack against him. The Mall Rats are sent the very best food as part of their deal with Mega, whereas May has to fend for herself, and Lex finds a new get rich quick scheme.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Amber refuses Mega's offer to be President of the City, while Siva and Ruby find out about Lex's scheme. Ebony carries on with her attacks on the Technos, and Trudy and Jay continue to bicker.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: Mega broadcasts Ebony's attack on CityNet in an attempt to turn the City against her, while she plots her next move against him. Lex's latest scheme lands him in trouble with Ruby, Java breaks free, and Salene becomes seriously ill.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: Jay is tortured with nightmarish visions in reality space, while Amber enlists Jack to help deceive Mega. Lex's business venture pays off greatly, Java seeks out Ebony, and Salene is in mortal danger, with only May for help.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: Mega commands Java to find Ebony and Jay, and she stops by the Mall to demand answers. Lex plans to visit the City for Ram, Ruby takes pity on a young girl, and Salene begins to recover from her illness.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Lex heads to the City, unaware that Ram and Slade are double crossing him, while Jay heads to Liberty. Salene and May try to get back into the safe zone, Ruby is jealous of Ebony, and Java receives a message.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Lex returns to the Mall, and is soon followed by Salene and May. Jay arrives in Liberty in search of Ebony, Mega offers Jack a job, Gel's attempt at romance fails, and Java receives another message.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: Jay asks for Ebony's help in the fight against Mega, while Jack tries to avoid revealing the details of his new job. Java wonders about Ram's fate, and Lex flies off the handle when he learns of May's treachery.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: Lex pressures Jack about acquiring the piece of software he needs for Ram, while Mega pushes Amber to publicly endorse the punishment program. Java receives a mysterious invitation, and Ruby attempts to make Ebony jealous.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: Those in Liberty are shocked by Java's arrival in town, and she immediately challenges Ebony to a final battle. Jack and Ellie are at loggerheads over the punishment program, and Salene starts drinking again.

episodes.name: Episode 39
episodes.overview: The devastated group at Liberty bury Java and Siva, with Lex angry at Ebony and Ram inconsolable. May confronts Salene about her drinking, Jack and Ellie fight, and Sammy risks breaking the law in an effort to impress Gel.

episodes.name: Episode 40
episodes.overview: Ellie's short temper lands her in trouble with Mega, Jay is conflicted in his feelings for Trudy, and Ruby's jealousy about Slade and Ebony's relationship intensifies.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: Having fooled Mega with their act, the rebels plot their next move. Lex puts his foot in it, Ruby is left heartbroken when she finds Ebony and Slade together, and Trudy misses Jay.

episodes.name: Episode 42
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats rescue Jay, while Ebony attacks Mega in the name of Java and Siva, and Darryl feels the City. Trudy finds out about Amber and Jay and puts herself in danger, and Salene learns of May's feelings for her.

episodes.name: Episode 43
episodes.overview: Mega tries to manipulate Trudy, and Ebony and Slade continue their attacks on the food stores. Salene and May evade Gel's questions about the love letter, with May heartbroken, while Ram is paranoid about being spied on.

episodes.name: Episode 44
episodes.overview: Lex helps Jack, who is now the most wanted person in the City, escape it. Mega continues his manipulation of Trudy, and May's sadness over Salene makes her leave the Mall for good.

episodes.name: Episode 45
episodes.overview: Amber and Jay are Mega's prisoners, Salene seeks refuge in alcohol again, and Ruby drops a bombshell on Ebony. Meanwhile, Gel makes her peace with Sammy, and Ellie goes after May.

episodes.name: Episode 46
episodes.overview: Jay is forced to confess his guilt via a CityNet broadcast, while Trudy learns of Mega's deception. Ram tells Ruby the truth about Slade's illness, and May tries to get Salene to stop drinking, but it only leads to more trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 47
episodes.overview: The group at Liberty ponder their next move, and Mega has a dark punishment for Amber and Jay. Back at the Mall, Trudy is guilt ridden over her unwitting role in the pair's capture, while on an unknown island, a caged Alice is joined by KC.

episodes.name: Episode 48
episodes.overview: The rebels begin their attack on the City, while back at the Mall, the tribe have to deal with Jay's memory loss. Meanwhile, Jack is suspicious of Ram, and in their cage on the island, Alice and KC are joined by an old enemy.

episodes.name: Episode 49
episodes.overview: The rebels celebrate their victory, while Ebony is left reeling by Slade's revelation about Mega. Amber is frustrated by Jay's memory loss, Ram reclaims the Technos headquarters, and Lottie comes up with a get rich quick scheme.

episodes.name: Episode 50
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats organize a party to celebrate their victory, but it is spoiled when Lex allows Mega to escape. Meanwhile, Amber and Jay become worried by Ram's computer Zoot, and Gel dresses to impress Lex.

episodes.name: Episode 51
episodes.overview: The City has no power or water, and Ram scrambles to bring the computer Zoot back under control. Mega tries to make a deal with Lex, the Guardian recognizes Alice and KC, and May gets Ruby a pregnancy test.

episodes.name: Episode 52
episodes.overview: The Mall Rats mobilize, determined to save as many people from the new virus as possible. Ebony resorts to desperate measures, Lottie's thieving lands her in trouble, and the tribe acquire a boat to flee the City.
